Text: ...Heh hehehe!
Finally, this day...
...has come!!!

A private summer beach. Epsilon arrives ahead
of nthe others and stands on the beach with a look
of confidence on her face.

I can finally show off my ultimate swimsuit figure to
Master Shadow!

*sigh* In this world, swimsuits remain exclusively in
the domain of those blessed with certain figures. In
other words, it's reserved for natural beauties...

But that was before the time of Master Shadow's
wisdom... That's right, now everything has changed.

With some subtle and precise magic manipulation,
I can use slime to recreate something comparable
to my actual skin.

On top of that, I can make its color, form, and
texture embody the ideal skin. Guess what
that means?

Epsilon instantly notices inconsistencies in her body
and fine-tunes its texture and volume.

It means I can meticulously adjust the size, shape,
and even the texture of my physique. Heheh... It's
a feat that airhead would never be capable of.

Today I've added a teaspoon more than usual to the
size of my overbust, and I've sized down my underbust
by two teaspoons.

Now all I need to do is pull everything up with my
swimsuit recreated from my slime suit...and done!

Perfect! That airhead lacks my experience, so she
wouldn't be capable of handling every situation.
Heheh... Too bad, Beta!

Intoxicated by her own body, Epsilon examines the
texture of each area of her figure as if appreciating
a proud work of art.
Hm... Hmm?

Speaking of bodies of water, there's always the
chance of my body and my lord's body physically
bumping into each other...
Maybe I should prioritize textures more than usual?

I'll maintain the softness when it jiggles but adjust
the texture on contact slightly...

If I can just use some intricate magic to make the
inner zone bouncy, it should give the outer area
a yielding texture...

Saying this, Epsilon touches her chest to check the
results.

...A little too hard? Maybe I should tone it down a
notch...

Aiming for the softness she desires, Epsilon
repeatedly makes subtle adjustments. She
continues to adjust the most minute details
until...
Yes, yes! That's it! This is the texture I wanted!

Now I should be fine no matter how much Master
Shadow stares or touches me by accident! It's
this kind of fine-tuning that counts!

Just as that airhead has her air-headed way of
fighting, I have my own distinct and precise way.

Now...then...being as attentive to details as I am,
I just need to give my usual performance, and I'll
win before Beta even realizes it.

For example, the first thing Master Shadow will need
while playing on the summer beach is fluids. I'll have
my special natural fruit juice ready in
advance.

Sure, it's a bit silly relying on natural fruits when
this is supposed to be my battle, but never mind
that.

My ultimate moment to shine is while Master Shadow is
taking a break. That's when I pull out my "Super Sexy
Pose to Die For, Summer Version"...

...which I've been studying for until today, along
with my massage technique! No one stands a
chance against me in a bathing suit!

Master Shadow will notice my allure and say to me on
the sunset beach...
...How strange, Epsilon.
Huh? What is it, Master?

When I'm with you, my heart flutters...and I feel
restless.
D-Do you mean...
...I've just realized it now. Epsilon, I—
Eeeek! Could something like that really happen?!

It could! It really could! After all, this is the beach—
where summer love happens! Why not raise my
expectations a little?!

Hold on...I'm getting a bit too carried away. I lost
track of time manipulating my slime and fantasizing.

My lord should be here soon once he's finished
changing... That's when the battle begins.
Heheh... Just you wait, Airhead!
And just you wait, Master!
I, Epsilon, will reign triumphant!
